channel.title: Disconnection On Shops
channel.description:
Can Someone Please Help me, I own a server and when ppl trade my shopkeepers they get Disconnected. this is he error its showing in my console.
[code] D: Dominionscape[fatal] - exception E: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -88 E: at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16923) E: at client.packetProcess(client.java:15831) E: at client.process(client.java:15803) E: at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) E: at server.main(server.java:55) [/code]

item.title: Disconnection On Shops
item.dc:creator: @Dominionscape Dominionscape
item.description:
@Dominionscape wrote:

ehh, i guess ill just movethem back to where they were at first, just wanted my server to look a bbit more uniqe than its source =[

Read full topic
